Job Title: Regional Associate Director New Segments Development LatAm

Location: Rahway, NJ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Product Management

Description:
Job Description

Position Description 

Regional Associate Director New Segments Development LatAm

Main Objective 

As the Regional Associate Director, your primary responsibility will be to identify, approach, and establish mutually beneficial partnership agreements. With a focus on Latin America's immense potential, a key growth strategy involves forging regional partnerships to explore untapped consumer segments for our products. In this role, you will play a crucial part in driving external collaboration with various companies and employers, contributing to the expansion and success of our organization in the region

Main Responsibilities

Proactively identify potential partnership opportunities and develop effective strategies to harness their potential.Collaborate closely with the sales and marketing teams across the region to identify and capitalize on partnership opportunities aligned with business objectives.Cultivate and nurture strong relationships with both existing and prospective partners, ensuring long-term collaboration and mutual growth.Develop innovative strategies to identify and capitalize on new partnership opportunities, aligning them with our organization's growth objectives.Stay updated on industry trends and market conditions to identify potential collaborations and partners that can drive mutual success.Conduct thorough research and analysis to evaluate the viability and potential impact of partnership opportunities.Monitor and evaluate the success of partnerships, making recommendations for adjustments and improvements as needed.Utilize in-depth understanding of products and services to effectively communicate the value proposition to potential partners.Drive the creation of joint initiatives and campaigns with sales and marketing teams, leveraging the benefits of strategic partnerships.Support and nurture partners' engagement by providing ongoing assistance, information, and guidance to ensure a thriving collaborative relationship that can be scaled across the region.

Skills

Deep expertise within the pharmaceutical industryDeep expertise in Alliance and Partnership Management and Business DevelopmentExperience leading B2B partnership and/or commercial relationship in the healthcare environment (specially with Insurance companies) is desired.Strong marketing expertise in the areas of strategy, market research, and promotional tacticsComfort levels engaging with a diversity of stakeholders across multiple divisions, countries, and regions.Strengths in influencing senior leaders, both internally and externallyBe resourceful, a self-starter with a proactive mindset.A strategic thinker and able to execute operationally and get things implemented.Analytical skills with an ability to synthesize data / insights into actionable business recommendations.Strong business, commercial, and financial acumenOutstanding collaborative skillsKnowledge of the pharmaceutical industry compliance and regulatory environment.

Position Qualifications

Knowledge

Education Graduate degree in Marketing, Communication, Engineering, Economics, Life Sciences or other related areas, plus postgraduate extension/MBA (Marketing and Sales Management, Business development or other related areas);Solid knowledge of working with external partners, Strategic Planning, Analytic Reading of the Market, Negotiation Techniques, Presentation Techniques.Strong command of the Excel & PowerPoint tool usage.Languages Fluent English (essential) and Spanish (desirable)

Experience

Minimum of 5-8 years of experience in the pharmaceutical industry in multiple roles (Example e.commerce, business development, marketing)Solid experience in the Latin America’s pharmaceutical industry (desirable)Experience indication agnostic with ability to understand needs of various therapeutic areas.Working with cross functional teams, ability to network across the organization.

Our employees are the key to our company’s success. We demonstrate our commitment to our employees by offering a competitive and valuable rewards program. Our Company’s benefits are designed to support the wide range of goals, needs and lifestyles of our employees, and many of the people that matter the most in their lives.
